tokens.text:
= SBSDKUI2BarButtonConfiguration(title: SBSDKUI2StyledText(text: "?reviewScreenAddButtonTitle",
                                                                 color: SBSDKUI2Color(colorString: "?sbColorOnPrimary",
                                                                                      isArgb: false)),
                                       accessibilityDescription: "?accessibilityDescriptionReviewAddButton",
                                       background: SBSDKUI2BackgroundStyle(strokeColor: SBSDKUI2Color(colorString: "#00000000",
                                                                                                      isArgb: false),
                                                                           fillColor: SBSDKUI2Color(colorString: "#00000000",
                                                                                                    isArgb: false),
                                                                           strokeWidth: 0.0),
                                       icon: SBSDKUI2IconStyle(color: SBSDKUI2Color(colorString: "?sbColorOnPrimary",
                                                                                    isArgb: false))),

= SBSDKUI2BarButtonConfiguration(title: SBSDKUI2StyledText(text: "?reviewScreenRetakeButtonTitle",
                                                                     color: SBSDKUI2Color(colorString: "?sbColorOnPrimary",
                                                                                          isArgb: false)),
                                           accessibilityDescription: "?accessibilityDescriptionReviewRetakeButton",
                                           background: SBSDKUI2BackgroundStyle(strokeColor: SBSDKUI2Color(colorString: "#00000000",
                                                                                                          isArgb: false),
                                                                               fillColor: SBSDKUI2Color(colorString: "#00000000",
                                                                                                        isArgb: false),
                                                                               strokeWidth: 0.0),
                                           icon: SBSDKUI2IconStyle(color: SBSDKUI2Color(colorString: "?sbColorOnPrimary",
                                                                                        isArgb: false))),

= SBSDKUI2BarButtonConfiguration(title: SBSDKUI2StyledText(text: "?reviewScreenCropButtonTitle",
                                                                     color: SBSDKUI2Color(colorString: "?sbColorOnPrimary",
                                                                                          isArgb: false)),
                                           accessibilityDescription: "?accessibilityDescriptionReviewCropButton",
                                           background: SBSDKUI2BackgroundStyle(strokeColor: SBSDKUI2Color(colorString: "#00000000",
                                                                                                          isArgb: false),
                                                                               fillColor: SBSDKUI2Color(colorString: "#00000000",
                                                                                                        isArgb: false),
                                                                               strokeWidth: 0.0),
                                           icon: SBSDKUI2IconStyle(color: SBSDKUI2Color(colorString: "?sbColorOnPrimary",
                                                                                        isArgb: false))),

= SBSDKUI2BarButtonConfiguration(title: SBSDKUI2StyledText(text: "?reviewScreenRotateButtonTitle",
                                                                     color: SBSDKUI2Color(colorString: "?sbColorOnPrimary",
                                                                                          isArgb: false)),
                                           accessibilityDescription: "?accessibilityDescriptionReviewRotateButton",
                                           background: SBSDKUI2BackgroundStyle(strokeColor: SBSDKUI2Color(colorString: "#00000000",
                                                                                                          isArgb: false),
                                                                               fillColor: SBSDKUI2Color(colorString: "#00000000",
                                                                                                        isArgb: false),
                                                                               strokeWidth: 0.0),
                                           icon: SBSDKUI2IconStyle(color: SBSDKUI2Color(colorString: "?sbColorOnPrimary",
                                                                                        isArgb: false))),

= SBSDKUI2BarButtonConfiguration(title: SBSDKUI2StyledText(text: "?reviewScreenDeleteButtonTitle",
                                                                     color: SBSDKUI2Color(colorString: "?sbColorOnPrimary",
                                                                                          isArgb: false)),
                                           accessibilityDescription: "?accessibilityDescriptionReviewDeleteButton",
                                           background: SBSDKUI2BackgroundStyle(strokeColor: SBSDKUI2Color(colorString: "#00000000",
                                                                                                          isArgb: false),
                                                                               fillColor: SBSDKUI2Color(colorString: "#00000000",
                                                                                                        isArgb: false),
                                                                               strokeWidth: 0.0),
                                           icon: SBSDKUI2IconStyle(color: SBSDKUI2Color(colorString: "?sbColorOnPrimary",
                                                                                        isArgb: false))),

= SBSDKUI2ButtonConfiguration(text: "?reviewScreenSubmitButtonTitle",
                                        accessibilityDescription: "?accessibilityDescriptionReviewSubmitButton",
                                        background: SBSDKUI2BackgroundStyle(strokeColor: SBSDKUI2Color(colorString: "?sbColorSurface",
                                                                                                       isArgb: false),
                                                                            fillColor: SBSDKUI2Color(colorString: "?sbColorSurface",
                                                                                                     isArgb: false),
                                                                            strokeWidth: 0.0),
                                        foreground: SBSDKUI2ForegroundStyle(color: SBSDKUI2Color(colorString: "?sbColorOnSurface",
                                                                                                 isArgb: false))))

abstract.text: Configuration of the bottom bar for the review screen.
